====== ComboStrap - Main Template Element ======


===== About =====
In a [[element|template layout]], ''main'' is the [[element|element]] where the content of your page is rendered. 


{{:docs:theme:element:layout_element.svg?0x250}}
===== Main Header and Footer =====

In a [[:docs:theme:template:template|template]], the ''main element'' may have a:
  * [[main_header|header]], located at its top 
  * and [[main_footer|footer]], located at its bottom 


For instance, you could add for each page:
  * the [[:docs:navigation:hierarchical_breadcrumb|hierarchical breadcrumb]] in the ''main header''
  * a [[:docs:social:share|share button]] in the ''main footer''
  * or any other component.
